paper_abstract: Let Gamma(k,g) be the class of k-connected cubic graphs of girth at least g. For several choices of k and g, we determine a set O-k,O-g of graph operations, for which, if G and H are graphs in Gamma(k,g,) G not equal H, and G contains H topologically, then some operation in O-k,O-g call be applied to G to result in a smaller graph G' in Gamma(k,g) such that, on one hand, G' is contained in G topologically, and on the other hand, G' contains H topologically.
